lead_paragraph: As the trial of two former allies of Gov. Chris Christie concludes, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is vowing to forge ahead, despite testimony that tied him to a damage-control campaign after the 2013 lane closings.

headline.print_headline: Bridge Case Has Become Thorny Issue for Cuomo
headline.main: Bridge Scandal Has Become Thorny Issue for Another Governor: Cuomo

snippet: As the trial of two former allies of Gov. Chris Christie concludes, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is vowing to forge ahead, despite testimony that tied him to a damage-control campaign after the 2013 lane closings....
abstract: Testimony of three former aides to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie in trial over 2013 George Washington Bridge closing suggests New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo had role in cover up, which he has consistently denied.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
